message.body: I'm leaving my parents' house in a few minutes. Should put me at your place right around 4
Well that was fast! Ingress available now on ios: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/ingress/id576505181?mt=8
Ok I'm on it! I just watched the intro video in the ingress website, haha.
I want to be green, right?
Yay! Yes, be green. Let me know what player name you pick. I would advise against picking something obviously female - most players are cool but there ar
Nah I was planning to be pretty anonymous!
There is literally a player called sexyambition. I'm not joking. She is blue, thank goodness.
Hahahaha. I would rather stick a fork in my ear. Sexily!
I'm reading the Wikipedia page to try to get a handle on this...
Hold on. I will email you a good link to look through. And of course feel free to ask me any questions!
Thank you! Do you use a lot of data with this thing?
It can use a lot, definitely. I'd say try it out for a day and take a look at your data usage. See if it's something you're OK with
Ok I gotta see what's up with this!
